title: Is it safe to update my Pixel XL to Android 10?
content: So I have been avoiding the Android 10 update on my Pixel XL because I have been hearing things with major battery drain issues, bootloops, and bricking. It's been mouths since all these posts been created and I want to know if all of these bugs are still a problem or will I be find updating. I would hate for my phone to be unusable and I need as much battery life as I can get out of my phone.
